title: World is born
brief_description: Sequence from “Fantasia” interpreting Stravinsky’s “Rites of Spring”. Depicts the first two billion years of the earth’s existence and it formation, convulsions, and upheavals and the first living creatures: unicellular forms, the first amphibians, the dinosaurs, the struggle for existence among the prehistoric monsters and the end of their era.
